title: How to Make a Sandvich Inspired by Team Fortress 2

steps.title: Lay down one slice of bread.
steps.content: Lay down one slice of bread.

steps.title: Lay down bologna.
steps.content: Lay down bologna. Fold it and layer the folded pieces.

steps.title: Put ham on top of bologna.
steps.content: Put ham on top of bologna. Do the same for the ham as for the bologna.

steps.title: Fold slices of Swiss cheese in two and put on top of meat.
steps.content: Fold slices of Swiss cheese in two and put on top of meat.

steps.title: Place several pieces of lettuce on top of that.
steps.content: Place several pieces of lettuce on top of that.

steps.title: Lay sliced tomato on top of lettuce.
steps.content: Lay sliced tomato on top of lettuce.

steps.title: Top with second slice of bread.
steps.content: Top with second slice of bread.

steps.title: Slice the bread in half, not perfectly diagonally however.
steps.content: Slice the bread in half, not perfectly diagonally however. Slice it slightly off the corner for best results.

steps.title: Add the olives.Then, last but not least, spear two pimento olives with two toothpicks and stick one in each triangle.
steps.content: Add the olives.Then, last but not least, spear two pimento olives with two toothpicks and stick one in each triangle.
